sentences: Brynjar Leifsson (born 11 September 1990) is an Icelandic musician.
Leifsson was raised in Keflavík, a town in southwest Iceland.
Leifsson has been in a relationship with musician Ragnhildur Gunnarsdóttir since at least 2014.
The two have a son named Hilmir Hrafn Brynjarsson.
Brynjar joined Nanna Bryndís Hilmarsdóttir's solo project, Songbird in 2009.
Brynjar is currently the lead guitarist in the band.
